channel.title: PI Herblore skill (need help grounding) Pestle on Unicorn horn etc
channel.description: Hey guys, can anyone provide me with a method that grounds some items like pestle on uncorn and all those types of grounding please! i am almost finished! and im working on a remake.

item.title: PI Herblore skill (need help grounding) Pestle on Unicorn horn etc
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

you probably added the method in the wrong spot

no need for (Client c)

why is it static

what the hell is data1.length

missing 2 brackets

no need to capitalize the G in grind or the D in dust

no need for so many parentheses in the if statement

missing a period after dust

Read full topic
item.source: PI Herblore skill (need help grounding) Pestle on Unicorn horn etc

item.title: PI Herblore skill (need help grounding) Pestle on Unicorn horn etc
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Alright, i just tried. i ended up with this. i compiled and got several errors
Heres the code…
i trieed! :S
public static void GrindOnItem(Client c, int useItem, int otherItem) {
for(int i = 0; i < data1.length; i++) {
if((useItem == 233 && otherItem == data1[i][0]) || (useItem == data1[i][0] && otherItem == 237)) {
c.sendMessage(“You Grind the object to Dust”);
return;
}

just make a method that when you use the horn, etc. on the mortar, it deletes the horn, and gives the dust… Very simple.
